data.title: Based on manhwa movies
data.meta_description: Based on manhwa movies: The God of High School (2020), Clean with Passion for Now (2018), Itaewon Class (2020), Affection (2021), Longing Heart (2018), A Killer Paradox (2024), Orange Marmalade (2015), Doona! (2023), Tower of God (2020), Eating Existence (2015)
